input.content:
Answer the following question with syntactically correct SQLite SQL. Be creative but the SQL must be correct.
Use only the following tables and columns:
Table: stadium. Columns: Stadium_ID (number), Location (text), Name (text), Capacity (number), Highest (number), Lowest (number), Average (number)
Table: singer. Columns: Singer_ID (number), Name (text), Country (text), Song_Name (text), Song_release_year (text), Age (number), Is_male (others)
Table: concert. Columns: concert_ID (number), concert_Name (text), Theme (text), Stadium_ID (text), Year (text)
Table: singer_in_concert. Columns: concert_ID (number), Singer_ID (text)

Question: How many singers do we have?
